WorkItem.ClosedComment:
Some basic questions. 

Do you have Compile On Save enabled, what kind of machines do you use? Number of CPU's, amount of RAM.

What are the things you are seeing, lot of tsc.exe process spinning up, high memory consumption?

Do you have extensions installed, like Web Essentials, Resharper? Does uninstalling alleviate the problems you're seeing?

From which version did you upgrade?

Closing for tracking. please re-open using the button on top.
WorkItem.Description:
hello...

unfortunately ever since the upgrade to TS1.0RC the stability and performance of the devenv has once again gone down significantly, pretty much to the same levels I have reported a while back ago (https://typescript.codeplex.com/workitem/1803)... what can we do to help you guys fix this? from my end, like last time, i can perhaps provide you guys with our entire solution so you guys can check it out... but like last time i would need to send it to you guys privately... if there's anything else we can do, please let us know. we are using vs 2012...  thanks again...
WorkItem.Summary: TS 1.0 RC devenv stability and performance down again
